BriefDescription: Processor cycles
Overflow from counter 2
The processor's data cache was reloaded with Shared (S) data from another core's L2 on the same chip due to a demand load
Double-Precion or Quad-Precision instruction completed

A Page Table Entry was loaded into the TLB from another chip's memory on the same Node or Group (Distant) due to a data side request. When using Radix Page Translation, this count excludes PDE reloads. Only PTE reloads are included
Store finish count. Includes speculative activity
A Page Table Entry was loaded into the TLB with Shared (S) data from another chip's L2 or L3 on the same Node or Group (Remote), as this chip due to a instruction side request
lsu marked instr PPC finish
Finish stall due to a vector fixed point instruction in the execution pipeline. These instructions get routed to the ALU, ALU2, and DIV pipes
LSU Finished a PPC instruction (up to 4 per cycle)
Cycles during which the marked instruction is next to complete (completion is held up because the marked instruction hasn't completed yet)

A Page Table Entry was loaded into the TLB with Shared (S) data from another chip's L2 or L3 on a different Node or Group (Distant), as this chip due to a data side request. When using Radix Page Translation, this count excludes PDE reloads. Only PTE reloads are included
Completion stall due to a long latency vector fixed point instruction (division, square root)
The processor's data cache was reloaded from a location other than the local core's L2 due to a demand load
A Page Table Entry was loaded into the TLB either shared or modified data from another core's L2/L3 on the same chip due to a instruction side request
The processor's Instruction cache was reloaded with Shared (S) data from another core's L2 on the same chip due to an instruction fetch (not prefetch)
stcx failed
Store Missed L1
The processor's data cache was reloaded with Modified (M) data from another core's L2 on the same chip due to a demand load
A Page Table Entry was loaded into the TLB from another chip's L4 on the same Node or Group ( Remote) due to a instruction side request
Cycles in which the LSU is empty for all threads (lmq and srq are completely empty)
Threshold counter exceeded a value of 32

Finish stall because the NTF instruction was a vector instruction issued to the Double Precision execution pipe and waiting to finish. Includes binary floating point instructions in 32 and 64 bit binary floating point format. Not qualified multicycle. Qualified by vector
PMC1 Rewind Value saved
The processor's Instruction cache was reloaded from local core's L3 due to an instruction fetch (not prefetch)
Demand LD - L2 Miss (not L2 hit)
Duration in cycles to reload with Modified (M) data from another chip's L2 or L3 on the same Node or Group (Remote), as this chip due to a marked load
The number a times the core transitioned from a stall to ICT-empty for this thread
A Page Table Entry was loaded into the TLB from a memory location including L4 from local remote or distant due to a instruction side request
A Page Table Entry was loaded into the TLB either shared or modified data from another core's L2/L3 on a different chip (remote or distant) due to a instruction side request
The processor's Instruction cache was reloaded from a location other than the local core's L2 due to an instruction fetch (not prefetch)
The processor's Instruction cache was reloaded from local core's L3 with dispatch conflict due to an instruction fetch (not prefetch)

A Page Table Entry was loaded into the TLB with Modified (M) data from another chip's L2 or L3 on a different Node or Group (Distant), as this chip due to a data side request. When using Radix Page Translation, this count excludes PDE reloads. Only PTE reloads are included
Stores completed from S2Q (2nd-level store queue).
LSU Reject due to LHS (up to 4 per cycle)
The processor's Instruction cache was reloaded from local core's L3 without conflict due to an instruction fetch (not prefetch)

A Page Table Entry was loaded into the TLB from another chip's L4 on a different Node or Group (Distant) due to a data side request. When using Radix Page Translation, this count excludes PDE reloads. Only PTE reloads are included
Marked probeNops completed
Store forwards that finished
Duration in cycles to reload with Shared (S) data from another core's ECO L3 on the same chip due to a marked load
The processor's Instruction cache was reloaded from local core's L3 without dispatch conflicts hit on Mepf state. due to an instruction fetch (not prefetch)
A Page Table Entry was loaded into the TLB with Modified (M) data from another chip's L2 or L3 on the same Node or Group (Remote), as this chip due to a instruction side request
A Page Table Entry was loaded into the TLB from another chip's memory on the same Node or Group ( Remote) due to a instruction side request

Finish stall because the NTF instruction was a scalar multi-cycle instruction issued to the Double Precision execution pipe and waiting to finish. Includes binary floating point instructions in 32 and 64 bit binary floating point format. Qualified by NOT vector AND multicycle
Finish stall because the NTF instruction was a tlbie waiting for response from L2
